name: Expedition 13  - Gold Donator Package
detailed_description:
Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13, all donations go directly towards our development fund to our developement and hosting!
Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the following benefits:

- Your donation means development can speed up significantly
- Be allowed to chastise contributors for not working hard enough for a month
- Be given permanent access to the Beta branch on Steam
about_the_game:

short_description: Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13. All donations go directly towards our development fund to our developement and hosting!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
